cs.DM, cs.DS, cs.LO, cs.GT, cs.SY

Reasoning: The paper deals with the problem of synchronizing coloring of directed finite strongly connected graphs, which is a topic in discrete mathematics (cs.DM) and graph theory (cs.DS). The problem also involves symbolic dynamics, which is a subfield of theoretical computer science (cs.SY). Additionally, the paper mentions the interest of specialists in the theory of graphs and deterministic automata, which are topics in computer science and discrete mathematics. Finally, the problem involves finding a solution based on certain conditions, which is related to computational complexity theory (cs.LO) and graph theory (cs.GT).
